short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modify the favicon to locate easily your most important working tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the web favicon image to allow you to move faster between tabs. Use regex or includes options to make 1 domain to have different favicons, based on your preferences and requirements.
